column2: #Payoffs are dependent on the state and the decision
#Cost of states are placeholders for now
compute_cost <- function(decision, state, Alive, HIV_testing, Conf_BT_result){
cost_state <- switch(state, "HIVneg"= cHealthy, "HIVacute"=cNoART, "HIVchronic"=cNoART, "HIVdiag_ART"= cART, "HIVdiag_NoART"= cNoART, "AIDS"= cAIDS, "Dead"=cDie )
cost_event1 <- if(Alive =="Yes") cHIVST else 0 #For the cost of usual care, it is only those who have the testing (i.e., they go to physician to be tested)
cost_event2 <- if(decision== "UsualCare"  | HIV_testing=="Yes") cUsualcare else 0  #For usual care if HIVST is yes then then receive the cost.
